participant_1.background:
I once got to see System of a Down live in concert, and it was one of the best experiences of my life.
i collect stamps.
I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants.
i volunteer in my spare time.
the kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them.

participant_2.background:
I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I would not be able to weld if I was blind because I need to see the metal I am welding.
i eat junk food.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.

content.text: Not much, just relaxing after a long day at school. I'm a student, what do you do for a living?
I'm a stay at home mom, and I also volunteer at the local animal shelter.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to volunteer at an animal shelter, but I've been too busy with school.
It's definitely rewarding! I love getting to help the animals and make a difference in their lives.
That's awesome! I'm sure the animals love you too.
I hope so! I love them all very much.
That's really sweet. I'm a musician, and I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs.
That's so cool! I love music, but I'm not very good at playing any instruments.
It's not too hard to learn! I started out playing the guitar, and it's been a lot of fun.
That's awesome! Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to express yourself.
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
